DOC.brief_summary: This open-label study evaluate safety tolerability topical ocular mecamylamine give twice day patient diabetic macular edema ( DME ) . Patients treat 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Topical Ocular Mecamylamine Diabetic Macular Edema ( DME )
DOC.criteria: macular edema due diabetic retinopathy vision loss ocular disease intraocular surgery within 3 month intraocular antiVEGF steroid within 3 month HbA1c > 12
